amendment.description: To amend the assistance to local educational agencies with significant enrollment changes in military dependent students due to force structure changes, troop relocations, creation of new units, and realignment under BRAC.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2450 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2450 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12506) To amend the assistance to local educational agencies with significant enrollment changes in military dependent students due to force structure changes, troop relocations, creation of new units, and realignment under BRAC.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2450 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2450 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Murray.
